questions.question: What is the predominant color of the main packaging?
What is the shape of the overall product package?
What is the apparent material of the primary packaging?
Is there a resealable feature present on the top of the packaging?
What color is the prominent text detailing the product weight?
What is the visible unit of weight displayed on the packaging?
Considering the back of the pack, what type of information is largely shown?
What color are the smaller text blocks containing specific nutritional information?
Does the packaging feature any illustrations or images of the product itself?
What is the overall texture of the primary packaging material, seemingly?
Are there any noticeable perforations or tear lines present on the packaging?
What is the general style of the primary text font?
Is the packaging design primarily focused on images or text information?
Considering the overall look, is the design sleek or rustic?
What secondary color accents are subtly visible on the packaging?
